text.value: Follow through with scheduled appointments or communicate changes in a timely manner

When was the last time you were visited by your CHW

Screen all under 5 children for malnutrition every month
Screen everyone in the household for TB each month
Screen all women of childbearing age for pregnancy and family planning

Please use the correct log in details
Kutsatira ndondomeko ya nthawi yomwe munagwirizana
Amabweleranso pa banja pano pasanathe masiku awiri akatumiza odwala kuchipatala

Ndondomeko yofufuza momwe anthu akugwilira ntchito
